description.en: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.ar: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.br: Aumenta o ganho de Exp em 50% (x1.5) por 1 hora. Pode ser acumulado até 2 vezes para um total de x2 de Exp. Não pode ser usado ao mesmo tempo que um básico Pergaminho de Amplificação ES. O buff é removido quando atinge o nível máximo para usá-lo.
description.cns: 1小时内经验值增加50% (1.5倍)。该物品可以叠加2次，总共2倍。无法与基础ES经验卷轴同时使用，一旦角色达到最大使用等级时此BUFF就会被移除。
description.de: Erhöht deine Erfahrung um 50% (x1,5) für eine Stunde. Dieses Item kann 2 Mal gestapelt werden bis zu einem Maximum von 100% (x2,0). Dieser Gegenstand kann nicht gemeinsam mit einer normalen Scroll of Amplification ES genutzt werden. Sobald du das Maximallevel für die Benutzung erreichst, wird der Bonus aufgehoben.
description.fi: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.fil: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.fr: Expérience augmentée de 50% (x1,5) pendant 1 heure, cumulable 2 fois pour un total de x2. N'est pas cumulable avec les Parchemins d'Amplification ES. Le bonus d'expérience disparaîtra si vous atteignez le niveau maximum du parchemin.
description.id: Meningkatkan perolehan Exp sebesar 50% (x1.5) selama 1 jam. Item ini dapat ditumpuk 2 kali dengan total x2 Exp. Tidak dapat digunakan bersamaan dengan Scroll dasar Amplifikasi ES. Buff akan dihapus setelah mencapai level maksimum untuk menggunakannya.
description.it: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.jp: 1時間、獲得経験値が50%（1.5倍）上昇します。2個まで重複でき、最大で獲得経験値2倍になります。戦神の巻物ESと同時使用はできません。使用可能な最大レベルに到達するとバフは自動で解除されます。
description.kr: 획득 경험치가 1시간 동안 50% 증가합니다.      레벨제한 : 41 ~ 60            (최대 2개 중복사용 가능)
description.nl: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.pl: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.ru: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.sp: Aumenta la Exp. ganada un 50% (x1.5) por 1h. Este objeto se puede acumular 2 veces para un total de x2 Exp. No se puede utilizar al mismo tiempo que un Pergamino de Amplificación ES básico. El beneficio se elimina una vez que se alcanza el nivel máximo para usarlo.
description.sw: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 2 times for a total of x2 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.th: เพิ่ม Exp ที่ได้รับ 50% (x1.5) เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง ไอเทมนี้สามารถซ้อนกันได้ 2 ครั้ง รวมเป็น x2 Exp ไม่สามารถใช้พร้อมกับ Scroll of Amplification ES พื้นฐานได้ บัฟจะถูกลบออกเมื่อถึงระดับสูงสุดที่จะใช้
description.tw: 經驗值提高 50% (x1.5)，持續 1 小時。 此物品可堆疊2次，總共 x2 經驗值。 不能和基本的經驗加成卷軸同時使用。 如果使用它，一旦達到最高等級，buff加成效果就會被移除。
description.vi: Tăng Tốc độ tăng thêm 50% (x1.5) trong 1 giờ. Vật phẩm này có thể được cộng dồn 2 lần với tổng cộng x2 Exp. Không thể sử dụng cùng lúc với Cuộn khuyếch đại ES cơ bản. Buff sẽ bị loại bỏ khi đạt đến cấp độ tối đa để sử dụng nó.
